## ReactUtils namespace

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

### ReactUtils namespace

<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { ReactUtils } from '@grafana/ui';
```

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getChildId(children)](./getchildid/) | Returns the ID value of the first, and only, child element |
|  [renderOrCallToRender(itemToRender, props)](./renderorcalltorender/) | Given react node or function returns element accordingly |
